verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I'm here to meet with You
Come and meet with me
I'm here to find You
Reveal Yourself to me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
As I wait
You make me strong
As I long
You draw me to Your arms
As I stand
And sing Your praise
You come You come
And You fill this place
Won't You come
Won't You come
And fill this place

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
Won't You come
Won't You come
And fill this place
Lord come
Lord come
And fill this place
